name: @svg-extract-color/rollup-plugin-svg-extract-color
description: A Rollup Plugin to extract svg color
author: lizijie123

scripts.build:dev: pnpm run rm && cross-env NODE_ENV=development rollup -c ./build/rollup.config.ts
scripts.build:prod: pnpm run rm && cross-env NODE_ENV=production rollup -c ./build/rollup.config.ts
